content1.title: Welcome!
content1.text: My name is John López, I am a freelance web programmer and 3D modeler.

content3.title: About me.
content3.text: My name is John López, I am a freelance web programmer. I have 2 years of experience working on different web projects mainly with technologies: JavaScript and PHP. In addition, I have experience as a teacher in the area of ​​technology and as a 3D modeler making a multitude of pieces focused mainly on 3D printing.

content4.title: Contact
content4.text: These are some of my networks, feel free to leave me a message.
